Services in hbpCommon

  • hbpDialogFactory

    hbpDialogFactory provides generic UI dialog.

  • hbpExpandableList

  • hbpGroupStore

    hbpGroupStore service let you retrieve and edit groups.

  • hbpUserDirectory

    hbpUserDirectory service let you retrieve and edit user and groups.

  • hbpXhrProgressEventInterceptor

    Add support for tracking progress events using angular.

  • hbpCollabStore
  • hbpConfigStore

  • hbpErrorService

    hbpErrorService provides helper functions that all return an HbpError instance given a context object.

  • hbpHiResService

    hbpHiResolution service provides helpers to deal with screen pixel ratio.

  • hbpUiUtil

    This service contains utility functions dedicated to the UI.

  • hbpUtil

    This service contains utility functions.
